comments.comment: Rata bedana giwisumak gena boru kiyala maha janathawa nomaga yawapu. Guruwarayata meyath dakinna labewa.api danna widihata 2013  hora rahasema mahinda rajaya wisin MCC giwisume palaweni kotasata athsan thaba etha.pasugi anduwen eya parlimenthuwta idiripath kireema nisa rwannak athi bawa minissu denagaththa. Eyata boru pracharayak dee mainda pila ha Ranil gahapu katuwa thama.Naganandata mada geseema ohuwa wanchakaryek lesa han wadu gaseema me lokkange salliwalata wikinunu un kala  dewalya.me danapapthiyan hithanne unge comis gena witharai.apita  neme me lankawe jeewath wena ahinsaka minissunta jathiwadayak mawala minissu mulakala pawata unta swabwa dahamen danduwan labewa.

replies.replyComment: Dihan Hettiarachchi thoth danagan mama kauda kiyala. para ponna naki  mee haraka.  Thoge nathi bari kamata tho RAJAPAKSA  paule eunge guu  kanna kadey giyata apit upathinma  posaththu.  Uba wagey eun RAJAPAKSA  lata kadey gihin  bada gostarey hoooya gaththata apita ehema kiseema adupaduwak apey demau piyo deela naha.  Europe  enna ubata thamai naki mee harak puka deegenama inna wenne.eyth ubata mehe ena eka heenayak witharai .   api mehey ada eeye nemei awe. mee Haraka unata umbaa nekiya idin. Puran wechcha kuburu tikawath hana thanakata heyththu weyan naki mee haraka.üêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉüêÉ

Dihan Hettiarachchi waren mee haraka  puluwannam jathakey kiyala denna. Habai uba wagey meeharak jathakayak nam nemei mee  harako.  RAJAPAKSA pawle gon wahal  hora huththige putho. ubage amma  ubata meeharak jathakayak dunnata ubage ammage huththa hoda rath karapu yakadayakin puchchapan.

@Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage uba inne euroopeya ratakada? Kaura uba wagee weesiyek ehee yewwe? Ranilta? Uba ranilta puka dunnada? Amer hukee. Thopi danagena kataakarapan mama kauda kiyana eka. Thopi inne europaa ratakanam, kanne a ratee bath Nam, lewa kaapiya suddonge pukawal.

@Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage uba geeni yekda ehemath nettam napundakayek da pakaya? Thoo wagee weesa hukannek heduwata wadaa hodai Badu Tika sarame pihida gattanam mal ponnaya. Ranilta jathaka wechcha ,ratata awajaathaka Keri weesi. Ammata hukapan Keri weesi.

Dihan Hettiarachchi ithin kari hukanno ubawa  ubage maha ekii hukagena thiyenneth meeharak paiyenne. eykane ubage katay nitharama pitawenne harak paiya gana.  mii haraka unata kamak naha umbaaaa nokiya hitapan. Eetath arabiye hoda ubala wagey gonnunta thamai. Apith ekka ubalata pahenna baha camment walata pana pana dunnoth misak. Lidey madiya wagey ubala danne  kagagaha inna . api inne EUROPEEYA  rataka . Renna pukey guuth nathi ubalata mineemaru paulata kadey gihin dena bath pakat eka vitharai . Ey hinda jeewath wenna gotage rena hiley mal gowa wagawak daganin. Un hoda eywa kala renne .hoda poora. mokada ubage asama thana tena hilane.

@Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage uba ipaduneth Rena hilenne Wal huththiye. Thawa Mona kathaada. Ubala wagee weesa geenu yawanna ona arabiyata. Mama kalin kiwwa wagee, ubata Gahanna ona madu waligen nemee, HARAK PAIYEN

Dihan Hettiarachchi ubata ochchara rahaida rena hila. eykada ubage katey nitharama kiyawenne puka gana. Aaa owwne kattiya arinne obage pukeyne. Renna pukey guuuth nathi ponna higanna thoo  amaruwen jeevithey gatagaha ganne puka deelane.  Meeharako thoge ammata hukonawa mage camment walata ringala hamannaganna enne thota mool gayada.
@Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage Ranil nemee, Prabhakaran ewilla pukee eriyath sabeepai kiyai thopi wagee weeseyo. Ube puken eliyata Apu ekek. Gon huththi
Dihan Hettiarachchi aaabola rila RAJAPAKSA paule eun   tkoge pukeyth ariyada ? Eykada ochchara kahinne mongal vidihata. Thoge oluwe wathurada thiyenne meeharak paiyo
@Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage patta weesi. Ranil pukee eriyath mehum daaganei uba.
Dihan Hettiarachchi aa bola thoge ammata harak paiyen  kotalada ubawa waduwe.harak paiya  gana dawasey kiyamanama wela thitenne .   eykada tho manda manasika rogayen pelenne hukannuo.
@Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage ubatath madu waligen gahala hariyanne nee. Harak paiyen kotanna ona. Gon huththi.

Nalika Udayangani eykanam aththa RAJAPAKSA paule eunge guu kana eunta kochchara kiwwath wadak naha. Unta thiyenne dan ithin gotage pukey mal goowa wagawak dala jeewath wenne adayamak hadaganna mokada gota janathawage mudal walin  hoda kama kala renne. Renna pukey guuth nathuwa jeew ath wenne amaruwenne. Oya mineemaruwanta chande dunna eunta hodama wadey.
@Nalika Udayangani ube Ammta pukee write ranil da hutto? Ranilta jathaka wechcha Gon pakaya
69 lakshema ubata pukee arinna ona. Gon keriya. Ubata madu wligen nemei harak paiyen Gahanna ona.
55 mal ponnayo dn da ubalata rata gana kakkumak awe mal ponnayo tika

comments.comment: Oba wahanselata notherunata athithaya hodin mathaka thiyena pura wasi apita owa hondata theruna. Thawama patan gaththe naha rajapaksalage keruwa. Mokoda bolayak diya yata radanna baha wagema egollage narakadi purudu kawadawath nathi karanna baha. Oba wahanselata notherunata meyala balaya illuwe rata hadanna neme. Karapu mahaparimana horakam mini marum dusana wanchawalin berennai. Ranil naththam meun okkoma ada inne hira gewal wala. Dan rajapaksala ranilwa beranawa puluwannam anduwata bala karanna ranilta wiruddawa nithiya kriyathmaka karanna kiyala. Eka kawadawath wenne naha
comments.author: Sirantha Ekanayake

replies.replyComment: Oba tuma hamuduronta banala aukasal puruwa  ganta  apa maha akusal ape owata madehat want apa. A aya wesada gatadan ape Bala emu malla
